entry.title: 3Commas Leak Exposes Over 100,000 APIs, CEO Confirms
entry.summary:
For a while now, 3Commas users have been posting on social media about a possible breach that led to their API keys being leaked. This resulted in unauthorized and unusual trading patterns on users‚Äô exchange accounts, in most cases, in a bid to pump and dump coins. 3Commas had so far denied all of the rumors saying there was no breach but with irrefutable evidence now staring them in the face, the crypto trading platform has taken responsibility for the first time.
How It Started
Popular on-chain sleuth ZachXBT took to his Twitter account to share some damning evidence that had been shared with him. In the screenshots shared with his more than 340,000 followers, someone claimed to have had access to more than 100,000 API keys leaked from 3Commas, which he eventually shared with Zach. ‚Ä¶

entry.title: China to Launch ‚ÄòDigital Asset Trading Platform,‚Äô Media Report Unveils
entry.summary:
A marketplace for digital assets is soon going to open in China under a public-private partnership, local media revealed. According to the report, the goal is to establish a regulated trading platform for digital collectibles as part of government efforts to curb market speculation with such assets.
National Marketplace to Support Trading of Digital Collectibles and Copyrights in China
Chinese authorities are preparing to launch a state-controlled platform allowing the trading of non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and other digital assets, local media announced. The initiative is a joint project between government organizations and a private company.
The ‚ÄúChina Digital Asset Trading Platform,‚Äù built in partnership by the China Technology Exchange, China Cultural Relics Exchange Center, and H‚Ä¶

entry.title: Bitcoin Ends 2022 With 55% Of Supply In Loss, But Is It Enough For Bottom?
entry.summary:
On-chain data shows Bitcoin is about to end 2022 with a peak supply in loss of 55%. Here‚Äôs how this value compares with previous bottoms.
Around 55% Of Total Bitcoin Supply Has Been Underwater Recently
As per CryptoQuant‚Äôs year-end dashboard release, this metric reached a value of 60% during previous bottoms. The ‚Äúsupply in loss‚Äù is an indicator that measures the percentage of the total circulating Bitcoin supply that‚Äôs currently carrying some loss.
The metric works by looking at the on-chain history of each coin in circulation to see what price it was last moved at. If this previous value for any coin was greater than the latest BTC price, then that particular coin is carrying some loss at the moment, and the indicator accounts for it.
The counterpart indicator is the ‚Äúsupply in‚Ä¶

entry.title: Fiji‚Äôs New Pro-Bitcoin Prime Minister Ponders Legal Tender Bill: Report
entry.summary: Newly elected Fiji Prime Minister Sitiveni Rabuka is pro-Bitcoin and is reportedly considering pushing a bill to adopt BTC as legal tender in the country. Pro-Bitcoin politician Sitiveni Rabuka recently took office as the new Prime Minister of the Pacific Islands of Fiji. Now, it seems the new PM is actively considering the adoption of bitcoin as legal tender there. While Rabuka himself hasn‚Äôt been very public about his opinions on Bitcoin thus far, Lord Fusitu'a, a noble and former member of parliament of neighboring nation Tonga, has reportedly confirmed that the Fijian politician is a bitcoin bull. "The new PM is definitely pro-Bitcoin," Lord Fusitu'a assured Cointelegraph. Lord Fusitu'a also shared the news on Twitter. "A new pro-#Bitcoin friendly Prime Minister in the South Pacific. F‚Ä¶

entry.title: Even Without A Mining Subsidy, These Two Factors Will Protect Bitcoin Into The Future
entry.summary: Many speculate that Bitcoin‚Äôs security will lapse with the end of the mining subsidy. But other factors will continue to incentivize miners. This is an opinion editorial by Dillon Healy, a member of the institutional partnerships team at Bitcoin Magazine and The Bitcoin Conference. A topic that has received increased attention lately is the concern around Bitcoin‚Äôs future ‚Äúsecurity budget.‚Äù This mainly stems from the worry that miner revenue will not be enough to offer adequate security in the future, post block subsidy. Bitcoin miners play a crucial part in securing the network by proposing blocks of transactions which nodes then verify, accept and update to the Bitcoin ledger. Competing against other miners to propose this new block to the chain, miners use intense computing power to com‚Ä¶

entry.title: These 17 Fraud Crypto Websites Have Been Flagged By California Regulators
entry.summary:
A total of 17 questionable crypto websites, which also include crypto brokers, have been flagged by the California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI). These websites are believed to be conducting fraudulent practices.
The warning against these 17 crypto websites and brokers was passed over a period of two days after these crypto entities appeared to be engaged in fraud against California consumers. The warnings were issued on the Consumer Alert page on December 27 and 28.
The DFPI stated:
The DFPI urges consumers to exercise extreme caution before responding to any solicitation offering investment or financial services. To check whether an investment or financial service provider is licensed in California
DFPI had last conveyed notifications regarding crypto ‚Ä¶

entry.title: Argentine Peso Breaks Historic Low Mark as Argentines Hedge Savings in Dollars
entry.summary: The U.S dollar-Argentine peso exchange rate escalated during December, with the Argentine fiat currency reaching new historic lows as citizens ran to exchange their holiday payments for dollars. The U.S. dollar reached a value of 356 pesos on December 28, losing almost 10% during just one week, and threatening to spur a more significant inflationary jump. Argentine Peso Sinks to Lowest Level in History Argentina, one of the countries in Latam with active exchange control for foreign currencies, is facing difficulties maintaining the value of its fiat currency. The exchange between U.S. dollars and Argentine pesos reached historic levels, with the peso sinking to its lowest level ever on Dec. 28. The dollar reached a price of 356 pesos in its parallel cash denomination, also called ‚Äúblue,‚Äù ‚Ä¶

entry.summary:
The Pacific Islands are set to cause a stir in the Bitcoin community in the coming year. Lord Fusitu‚Äôa, a Tongan noble and former member of the Tongan parliament, announced that Fiji has elected a new pro-Bitcoin prime minister.
The Twitter post read:
Congratulations to brother Sitiveni Rabuka and our GOPAC Fiji‚Äôs Biman Prasad on winning your seats in the Fijian elections ‚Äì And for being elected Prime Minister & Deputy Prime Minister of Fiji respectively. Toso Viti.

entry.title: Report: Central African Republic Postpones Sango Coin Listing
entry.summary:
The Central African Republic‚Äôs plan to list the sango coin in the last quarter of 2022 has been put on hold, while the scheduled unlocking of 5% of token holders‚Äô portfolios has similarly been postponed, a statement from the team promoting the token has reportedly said. The decision to delay the listing of the coin was prompted by what the team terms ‚Äúcurrent market conditions.‚Äù
Scheduled Token Unlocking Postponed
Nearly eight months after becoming the first country in Africa to adopt bitcoin, the Central African Republic (CAR) recently said it will not proceed with the listing of its ‚ÄúSango‚Äù crypto token as planned. In a statement reportedly posted in a sango coin Telegram group, the team promoting the token claimed that ‚Äúcurrent market conditions‚Äù had necessitated this decision.

entry.title: North Korean Hackers Pose As VC Firms And Banks To Steal Millions From Crypto Startups
entry.summary:
North Korean hackers are taking it a notch higher by pretending to be venture capitalists to steal from cryptocurrency startups.
BlueNoroff, the name given by cybersecurity experts to a crew¬†associated with the North Korean government-funded¬†hacking operation Lazarus Group, has expanded its target list to include venture capital firms, cryptocurrency startups, and banks, a report¬†by cybersecurity firm Kaspersky Lab disclosed.
BlueNoroff stole millions of dollars in cryptocurrencies by building more than 70 phony domains and mimicking financial firms¬†and venture capital businesses, as revealed by Kaspersky on Tuesday.
BlueNoroff is experimenting with new file types and delivery techniques for its virus, according to Kaspersky‚Äôs report. The North Korean hacker‚Äôs cybercrime activities i‚Ä¶

entry.title: Ripple: SEC Tries Flimsy Way To Expand Its Turf, Says Legal Expert
entry.summary:
In a new article for Forbes, legal expert Roslyn Layton is criticizing the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) for its questionable enforcement policy against the crypto industry and Ripple in particular. Meanwhile, frustration with the SEC and lawmakers is growing in the U.S. crypto industry.
Despite the fact that various industry leaders have called for clear laws and guidance for regulated progress, the agency led by Gary Gensler refuses to act. Instead, Gensler has repeatedly emphasized recently that the present regulatory framework is sufficient, and that the SEC will continue to rely on its regulatory approach through enforcement.
As Layton denounces, this is a policy driven by political interests. ‚ÄúRegulators sometimes use headline grabbing to send political messages t‚Ä¶

entry.title: Raising in a Bear Market: Slow Ventures, Volt Capital, Conviction, AngelBlock at 0xpo Summit
entry.summary: Clay Robbins of Slow Ventures, Soona Amhaz of Volt Capital, Sarah Guo of Conviction and formerly Greylock, and Alex Strzesniewski of AngelBlock joined Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Summit in San Francisco on November 3 for an extensive panel on raising venture money even during Crypto Winter.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Bored Ape Yacht Club Wins NFT Project of the Year
entry.summary: Illa Da Producer accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Yuga Labs from presenter Alanna Roazzi-Laforet at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Moonbirds, Azuki, DeGods, and CloneX.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: Art Blocks Founder Wins Industry Achievement Award
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon accepted the industry achievement award from presenter Clara Tsao of Filecoin Foundation at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: BFF Wins Diversity Award
entry.summary: Rachel Weiss and Jackie Courtney accepted the Cryptie for BFF from presenter Rebecca Barkin of Lamina1 at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were WomenRise, Boys Club, and The Hug.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Crypto Unicorns Wins Game of the Year
entry.summary: Katrina Wolfe accepted the Cryptie for Crypto Unicorns from presenter Avery Akkineni of Vayner3 at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Stepn, Zed Run, and Blankos Block Party.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: Celo Wins Social Impact Award
entry.summary: Marek Olszewski accepted the Cryptie for Celo from presenter Dan Roberts of Decrypt Media at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Ukraine DAO, Dream DAO, Proof of Protest, and Digital Diaspora.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: People of Crypto Wins Metaverse Event of the Year
entry.summary: Simone Berry and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie for People of Crypto's Metaverse Pride Parade from presenter Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Decentraland's Metaverse Fashion Week and Heal from The Sandbox and Code Green.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: Doodles Collab With Shopify Wins Mainstream Award
entry.summary: Shirley Cedeno and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Doodles from presenters Igor Lilic and Gabriela Ramos Lilic of Breakout at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were RTFKT and Nike, Gmoney and Adidas, Tiffany and CryptoPunks, and TIMEpieces.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Lens Protocol Wins DeFi Project of the Year
entry.summary: Bradley Freeman and Christina Beltramini accepted the Cryptie for Lens Protocol from presenter Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Aave, dYdX, and OlympusDAO.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Coinbase Ventures Wins Investor of the Year
entry.summary: Shan Aggarwal accepted the Cryptie for Coinbase Ventures from presenter Amanda Cassatt of Serotonin at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Paradigm, a16z, and Polychain.

entry.title: Blocknative CEO Matt Cutler at 0xpo Crossroads
entry.summary: Blocknative's Matt Cutler sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to tell his Web3 origin story and Blocknative's business‚Äîplus misconceptions in the crypto space.
